data.name: WiA - Launching New Voices - Agile2020
data.description: The Women in Agile community reaches another milestone, celebrating our fifth annual half-day conference! Join us Sunday July 19, 2020 in Orlando.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
relatedRecords.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.
